title: 36 PCS Furniture Silicone Protection Cover, Silicone Chair Leg Cups Transparent Silicone Anti-Slip Chair Leg Pads Caps Cover, Round & Square Furniture Table Feet Covers, Prevent Floor Scratches
features: ★【 Furniture Silicon Protection Cover】: 36pcs transparent silicone furniture/table/chair leg cover, The chair leg cover full of elasticity can tightly wrap the furniture legs,round and compact, not obtrusive, and does not affect the beauty of the furniture.
★【Floor Protectors】: No more floor scratching, These chair leg caps protectors can protect furniture legs and floor from damage. Easy put on and fit tight.

★【Non-slip and Wear-resistant】: The bottom of the Furniture Silicon Protection Cover has a non-slip function. The non-slip underlay prevents scratches and noise, leaving no trace. The bottom is thick and wear-resistant, which can prevent the chair feet from rubbing against the floor.

★【Easy To Use - 36PCS】: Lightweight and easy to install, put it on directly to use, no tools needed, no need to stick, no chair foot cleaning needed. Lock design & internal non-slip particles make it not easy to fall off. No need to paste to firmly grasp the feet of furniture.

★【Applicable to Any Shape of Furniture Feet】: Elastic, suitable for round and square furniture feet and other shapes. For example, restaurant chairs, bar stools, terrace chairs, kitchen chairs, metal bistro chairs, etc.
description: 1, Silicone Protection Cover allows the chair to slide quietly and smoothly on the floor without leaving marks. 2, Suitable for any shape of furniture legs. Elastic, suitable for round and square furniture legs and other shapes. 3, The furniture protection cover can prevent the friction between the furniture legs and the floor, and protect the table legs and the floor of the chair from damage. 4, Transparent design can be well integrated into your furniture, hardly attracting attention.

1．Transparent design can be well integrated into your furniture, almost unnoticed. 2．Suitable for round and square and other shapes of furniture feet, such as restaurant chairs, bar stools, patio chairs, kitchen chairs, and metal bistro chairs, etc. 3．Easy to use, not easy to fall off, protect the floor, reduce noise.
Package includes: 36X square furniture silicone protection cover Bottom width: 1.57inch Opening width: 1.37inch Height: 1.37inch Color: transparent Material: high-quality silicone
Suitable for chair legs 1.37-1.57 inches/35-40mm. Please measure the chair leg size before ordering.
